title: Font ID
content:
Need to know name of this font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417193703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_6477.png)
author: mohdumar

comments.content:
There are 3 fonts actually:  
"ALLPAK" is **Arctic** , a (free?) font by Daryl L. Houston  
"BMUN" looks like **BN Police** by Ben Nathan (1999)  
"2012" must be **[Amerika Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417193703/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Amerika%20Sans%20-%20Regular&fid=5d726d565876da172810bea71e2ee3ad&fsize=60&text=2012&wrap=2)** by Apostrophic Labs (2001)

------------------  
I found them using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417193703/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
